cn.robotpen.core.widget

类 PhotoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • cn.robotpen.core.widget.PhotoView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    cn.robotpen.core.view.IRecordView

    public class PhotoView
extends View
implements cn.robotpen.core.view.IRecordView
    用于添加在画布里的图片视图，实现拖动、缩放
